member.name: T:PHP.Library.Xml.XMLReader.FileUriResolver
member.summary: HTML-encoded paths are converted into unix path. Probably .Net trying to assume we're a web-server. Original URI from PHP: file:///Z%3A%5CPhalanger%5CTesting%5CTests%5CXml%5CxmlReader/dtdexample.dtd Uri.ToString(): file:///Z:/Phalanger/Testing/Tests/Xml/xmlReader/dtdexample.dtd Uri.LocalPath: /Z:/Phalanger/Testing/Tests/Xml/xmlReader/dtdexample.dtd As a workaround, we simply load Uri.ToString() into a new Uri (so the resulting LocalPath is correct). Result: Z:\Phalanger\Testing\Tests\Xml\xmlReader\dtdexample.dtd

member.name: T:PHP.Library.Xml.ExceptionCode
member.summary: Enumerates codes.

member.name: F:PHP.Library.Xml.ExceptionCode.IndexOutOfBounds
member.summary: Index or size is negative, or greater than the allowed value.

member.name: F:PHP.Library.Xml.ExceptionCode.StringTooLong
member.summary: The specified range of text does not fit into a string.

member.name: F:PHP.Library.Xml.ExceptionCode.BadHierarchy
member.summary: A node is inserted somewhere it doesn't belong.

member.name: F:PHP.Library.Xml.ExceptionCode.WrongDocument
member.summary: A node is used in a different document than the one that created it.

member.name: F:PHP.Library.Xml.ExceptionCode.InvalidCharacter
member.summary: An invalid or illegal character is specified, such as in a name.

member.name: F:PHP.Library.Xml.ExceptionCode.DataNotAllowed
member.summary: Data is specified for a node which does not support data.

member.name: F:PHP.Library.Xml.ExceptionCode.DomModificationNotAllowed
member.summary: An attempt is made to modify an object where modifications are not allowed.

member.name: F:PHP.Library.Xml.ExceptionCode.NotFound
member.summary: An attempt is made to reference a node in a context where it does not exist.

member.name: F:PHP.Library.Xml.ExceptionCode.NotSupported
member.summary: The implementation does not support the requested type of object or operation.

member.name: F:PHP.Library.Xml.ExceptionCode.AttributeInUse
member.summary: An attempt is made to add an attribute that is already in use elsewhere.

member.name: F:PHP.Library.Xml.ExceptionCode.InvalidState
member.summary: An attempt is made to use an object that is not, or is no longer, usable.

member.name: F:PHP.Library.Xml.ExceptionCode.SyntaxError
member.summary: An invalid or illegal string is specified.

member.name: F:PHP.Library.Xml.ExceptionCode.ModificationNotAllowed
member.summary: An attempt is made to modify the type of the underlying object.

member.name: F:PHP.Library.Xml.ExceptionCode.NamespaceError
member.summary: An attempt is made to create or change an object in a way which is incorrect with regard to namespaces.

member.name: F:PHP.Library.Xml.ExceptionCode.InvalidAccess

member.name: T:HtmlAgilityPack.HtmlDocument
member.summary: Represents a complete HTML document.

member.name: F:HtmlAgilityPack.HtmlDocument.OptionAddDebuggingAttributes
member.summary: Adds Debugging attributes to node. Default is false.

member.name: F:HtmlAgilityPack.HtmlDocument.OptionAutoCloseOnEnd
member.summary: Defines if closing for non closed nodes must be done at the end or directly in the document. Setting this to true can actually change how browsers render the page. Default is false.

member.name: F:HtmlAgilityPack.HtmlDocument.OptionCheckSyntax
member.summary: Defines if non closed nodes will be checked at the end of parsing. Default is true.

member.name: F:HtmlAgilityPack.HtmlDocument.OptionComputeChecksum
member.summary: Defines if a checksum must be computed for the document while parsing. Default is false.

member.name: F:HtmlAgilityPack.HtmlDocument.OptionDefaultStreamEncoding
member.summary: Defines the default stream encoding to use. Default is System.Text.Encoding.Default.

member.name: F:HtmlAgilityPack.HtmlDocument.OptionExtractErrorSourceText
member.summary: Defines if source text must be extracted while parsing errors. If the document has a lot of errors, or cascading errors, parsing performance can be dramatically affected if set to true. Default is false.

member.name: F:HtmlAgilityPack.HtmlDocument.OptionExtractErrorSourceTextMaxLength
member.summary: Defines the maximum length of source text or parse errors. Default is 100.

member.name: F:HtmlAgilityPack.HtmlDocument.OptionFixNestedTags
member.summary: Defines if LI, TR, TH, TD tags must be partially fixed when nesting errors are detected. Default is false.

member.name: F:HtmlAgilityPack.HtmlDocument.OptionOutputAsXml
member.summary: Defines if output must conform to XML, instead of HTML.

member.name: F:HtmlAgilityPack.HtmlDocument.OptionOutputOptimizeAttributeValues
member.summary: Defines if attribute value output must be optimized (not bound with double quotes if it is possible). Default is false.

member.name: F:HtmlAgilityPack.HtmlDocument.OptionOutputOriginalCase
member.summary: Defines if name must be output with it's original case. Useful for asp.net tags and attributes

member.name: F:HtmlAgilityPack.HtmlDocument.OptionOutputUpperCase
member.summary: Defines if name must be output in uppercase. Default is false.

member.name: F:HtmlAgilityPack.HtmlDocument.OptionReadEncoding
member.summary: Defines if declared encoding must be read from the document. Declared encoding is determined using the meta http-equiv="content-type" content="text/html;charset=XXXXX" html node. Default is true.

member.name: F:HtmlAgilityPack.HtmlDocument.OptionStopperNodeName
member.summary: Defines the name of a node that will throw the StopperNodeException when found as an end node. Default is null.

member.name: F:HtmlAgilityPack.HtmlDocument.OptionUseIdAttribute
member.summary: Defines if the 'id' attribute must be specifically used. Default is true.

member.name: F:HtmlAgilityPack.HtmlDocument.OptionWriteEmptyNodes
member.summary: Defines if empty nodes must be written as closed during output. Default is false.
